import React,{useState}from'react';import CouponForm from'./components/CouponForm';import UpdateCouponForm from'./components/UpdateCouponForm';import AdminPanel from'./components/AdminPanel';import AdminLogin from'./components/AdminLogin';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[view,setView]=useState('form');// 'form', 'admin', 'update'
const[adminAuthenticated,setAdminAuthenticated]=useState(false);const[couponToUpdate,setCouponToUpdate]=useState(null);const handleAdminLogin=()=>{setAdminAuthenticated(true);};const handleUpdateClick=coupon=>{setCouponToUpdate(coupon);setView('update');};const handleUpdateSuccess=()=>{setCouponToUpdate(null);setView('admin');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Dynamic QR Coupon System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setView('form'),children:"Coupon Form"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setView('admin'),children:"Admin Panel"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[view==='form'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CouponForm,{}),view==='admin'&&(!adminAuthenticated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminLogin,{onLogin:handleAdminLogin}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminPanel,{onUpdate:handleUpdateClick})),view==='update'&&couponToUpdate&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UpdateCouponForm,{coupon:couponToUpdate,onUpdateSuccess:handleUpdateSuccess,onCancel:()=>setView('admin')})]})]});}export default App;
